name: Reduced-Threat Peryton
languages: understands Common and Elvish but can't speak

trait.name: Reduced Threat
entries: A reduced-threat monster takes a −2 penalty on attack rolls (included in the stat block), ability checks (included in the stat block for skill proficiencies), saving throws (included in the stat block for saving throw proficiencies), and saving throw DCs (included in the stat block).

trait.name: Dive Attack
entries: If the peryton is flying and dives at least 30 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a melee weapon attack, the attack deals an extra 9 ({@damage 2d8}) damage to the target.

trait.name: Flyby
entries: The peryton doesn't provoke an opportunity attack when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

trait.name: Keen Sight and Smell
entries: The peryton has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight or smell.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The peryton makes one gore attack and one talon attack.

action.name: Gore
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Talons
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 2d4 + 3}) piercing damage.
